thread.section_title: PACK & SEND Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PACK & SEND Australia | www.packsend.com.au
thread.title: Peter Christensen
thread.title_full: PACK & SEND Australia reviewed by Peter Christensen

author: Peter Christensen
title: Peter Christensen
text: Have bought many items interstate mainly hi end collectables and on all occasions either organised for a Pack and Send Store to pick up on my behalf or had the Seller drop off. All items have been packed professionally and arrived safe. I have found Shipping direct to my closet P&S to be the most convenient as I can collect when my schedule permits. Seriously won't use anyone else.
